title: India cannot do away with energy security to meet climate goals: Official
description: India's power demand touched an all-time high of 243.27 GW in September this year. India has installed power generation capacity of about 426 GW, including over 213 GW coal and lignite based.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
